name: item1
description: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt

name: item2
description: La vie est ce qui arrive quand vous êtes occupé à faire d'autres projets. - John Lennon

name: item3
description: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends. - Martin Luther King Jr.

name: item4
description: Das Leben ist, was passiert, während du eifrig dabei bist, andere Pläne zu machen. - John Lennon

name: item5
description: La única limitación para la realización de mañana son nuestras dudas de hoy. - Franklin D. Roosevelt

name: item6
description: La vita è ciò che accade mentre sei impegnato a fare altri progetti. - John Lennon

name: item7
description: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself. - Franklin D. Roosevelt

name: item8
description: La seule chose que nous devons craindre est la peur elle-même. - Franklin D. Roosevelt

name: item9
description: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years. - Abraham Lincoln

name: item10
description: Am Ende zählen nicht die Jahre in deinem Leben, sondern das Leben in deinen Jahren. - Abraham Lincoln

name: item11
description: Al final, no son los años en tu vida los que cuentan. Es la vida en tus años. - Abraham Lincoln

name: item12
description: Alla fine, non sono gli anni della tua vita che contano. È la vita nei tuoi anni. - Abraham Lincoln

name: item13
description: The best way to predict the future is to create it. - Peter Drucker

name: item14
description: La meilleure façon de prédire l'avenir est de le créer. - Peter Drucker

name: item15
description: Die beste Art, die Zukunft vorherzusagen, ist, sie zu erschaffen. - Peter Drucker

name: item16
description: La mejor manera de predecir el futuro es crearlo. - Peter Drucker

name: item17
description: Il modo migliore per predire il futuro è crearlo. - Peter Drucker

name: item18
description: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt

name: item19
description: La vie est ce qui arrive quand vous êtes occupé à faire d'autres projets. - John Lennon

name: item20
description: Das Leben ist, was passiert, während du eifrig dabei bist, andere Pläne zu machen. - John Lennon
